document.full_text: rafa nadal continued his extraordinary love affair with the monte carlo masters by sealing his seventh straight title on the monaco clay after a 6-4 7-5 win over fellow spaniard david ferrer on sunday.
document.title: nadal beats ferrer for seventh monte carlo crown
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal continued his extraordinary love affair with the monte carlo masters by sealing his seventh straight title on the monaco clay after a 6-4 7-5 win over fellow spaniard david ferrer on sunday.
